name: Laserhand
description:
Originally designed for mobile, Laserhand is a VR-like Arcade FPS where you play as LASERHAND and fight deadly robot drones with powerful laser attacks.

Drones spawn from every direction and try to destroy you, but you must find them and laser them first. You better shoot quickly, and keep alert, because they keep coming and keep getting stronger.

There are 3 enemy types: Drone, Drone Swarm, and Drone Boss. 

There are 2 powerup types: Slow-Mo, and Healing.

There are also multiple difficulties and game modes.

Defeating enemies (or powerups) awards you with points that contribute to a highscore in each difficulty. Challenge your friends, or yourself, and see if you have what it takes to survive.

Controlled via the mouse on PC. Controlled by tilt (looking) and touch (shooting) for mobile.

Best enjoyed on Android via the Play Store (linked below).

Thanks for checking out Laserhand!
